public abstract class ItemEditPanel<T>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

A panel for viewing the information stored in a list item.

Field Detail

DEFAULT_LOCALE

protected static final java.util.Locale DEFAULT_LOCALE
The default locale, more specifically Finnish (Finland), used for displaying currencies.

CURRENCY_FORMAT

protected static final java.text.NumberFormat CURRENCY_FORMAT
NumberFormat for the default currency (EUR), with the added property of always rounding up (so the seller doesn't lose money even though the profit is very marginal).
